Package keystone.api

Class Keystone

java.lang.Object
keystone.api.Keystone
public final class Keystone extends Object
Base Keystone API class, used to retrieve Modules, global state, and toggle whether Keystone is active. Also contains Logger and Random instances

      public static boolean isActive()

    • getModule

      public static <T extends IKeystoneModule> T getModule(Class<T> clazz)
      Get a registered Module by class
      Type Parameters:
      T - A class implementing IKeystoneModule
      Parameters:
      clazz - The module class to retrieve
      Returns:
      The module, or null if it is not registered

      Schedule a Runnable to run on the server thread next tick
      Parameters:
      runnable - The Runnable to run on the server thread

    • runOnMainThread

      public static void runOnMainThread(int delay, Runnable runnable)
      Schedule a Runnable to run on the server thread after a given delay
      Parameters:
      delay - The delay, in ticks
      runnable - The Runnable to run after the delay

    • runInternalFilter

      public static void runInternalFilter(KeystoneFilter filter)

      INTERNAL USE ONLY, DO NOT USE IN FILTERS

      Run an internal, hard-coded filter on the current selection boxes
      Parameters:
      filter - The KeystoneFilter to run

    • runInternalFilter

      public static void runInternalFilter(KeystoneFilter filter, int ticksDelay)

      INTERNAL USE ONLY, DO NOT USE IN FILTERS

      Run an internal, hard-coded filter on the current selection boxes after a given tick delay
      Parameters:
      filter - The KeystoneFilter to run
      ticksDelay - The amount of ticks to wait before running the filter

      public static void abortFilter(String... reason)
      Cancel filter execution and log the reason
      Parameters:
      reason - The reason for canceling filter execution

    • filterException

      public static void filterException(KeystoneFilter filter, Throwable throwable)
      Report an exception raised by a filter and log it to the player
      Parameters:
      filter - The KeystoneFilter which raised the exception
      throwable - The Throwable that was raised

    • init

      public static void init()

      INTERNAL USE ONLY, DO NOT USE IN FILTERS

      Initialize Keystone. Ran once when the mod setup event is called in KeystoneMod

    • postInit

      public static void postInit()

      INTERNAL USE ONLY, DO NOT USE IN FILTERS

      Post-initialize keystone. Ran once after all modules have been registered
